<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:clao_es_20070119_2_0020310</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020310</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Recorrido por territorios griegos</string>
            <string language="en">Journey through Greek territories</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reise durch griechische Gegenden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voyage par les territoires grecs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Viagem através dos territórios gregos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Viaggio attraverso i territori greci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξίδι μέσω των ελληνικών εδαφών</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Sencilla actividad consistente en hacer click sobre las zonas de un mapa del Mediterráneo correspondientes a lugares geográficos de la civilización griega y sus principales zonas de influencia.</string>
            <string language="en">Simple activity in which the student must click on the areas of a map of the Mediterranean which were part of the Greek civilization or under its influence.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Grecia</string>
            <string language="en">Greece</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">territorios</string>
            <string language="en">territories</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfache Aktivität, in der der Kursteilnehmer die
Bereiche einer Karte von den Mittelmeer an klicken muß, die Teil der 
griechischen Zivilisation oder unter seinem Einfluß waren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activité simple dans laquelle l'étudiant doit 
cliquer sur les zones d'une carte des méditerranéens qui 
étaient une partie de la civilisation grecque ou sous son influence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividade simples em que o estudante deve estalar 
sobre as áreas de um mapa do mediterranean que eram parte da 
civilização grega ou sob sua influência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività semplice in cui l'allievo deve scattare 
sopra le zone di un programma dei Mediterraneo che facevano parte 
della civilizzazione greca o sotto la relativa influenza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απλή δραστηριότητα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να 
χτυπήσει στις περιοχές ενός χάρτη της Μεσογείου που ήταν μέρος 
του ελληνικού πολιτισμού ή κάτω από την επιρροή της.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechenland</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gegenden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Grèce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">territoires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Greece</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">territórios</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Grecia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">territori</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελλάδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εδάφη</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
